The claim originated from the web site G: which cited Trending News Guide as their source, which in turn cited Liberty First News, which had cited a now-deleted 2014 report published by the Civic Tribune.
The Civic Tribune: s report in 2014 was debunked by Yellowstone officials, stating that the park was not being evacuated and that the supervolcano was not erupting.
The Yellowstone National Park web site a: s web site made no mention of any recent evacuation or alerts about an imminent volcanic eruption.
The United States Geological Survey: s Yellowstone Volcano Observatory reported that activity in the Yellowstone Plateau region was at normal levels, indicating no signs of an imminent volcanic eruption.
